page.title: 16Lifestyles and Attitudes
page.content: come from Newcastle (understandably). Most families again owned a car, but some did not. One question asked in our interview was what did people do with their leisure time. The answers varied from person to person (ie.from bingo and/or the public house to involvement in the community centre or church groups). The final question to be asked was what annoyed people living in the area and again there was a wide range of answers. Anything from the Government or Margaret Thatcher to vandalism, and even pregnancy!!!
